code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Routes,Link}from"react-router-dom";import{FaShoppingCart,FaList,FaDollarSign}from"react-icons/fa";import"./App.css";import"./styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const categories={Fruits:["🍎 Apple","🍊 Orange","🍌 Banana"],Vegetables:["🥕 Carrot","🥦 Broccoli","🌽 Corn"],Dairy:["🥛 Milk","🧀 Cheese","🍦 Yogurt"]};const GrocerySelection=_ref=>{let{addItem}=_ref;const[selectedCategory,setSelectedCategory]=useState(null);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Select Groceries"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"categories",children:Object.keys(categories).map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"category-btn",onClick:()=>setSelectedCategory(category),children:category},category))}),selectedCategory&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"items",children:categories[selectedCategory].map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"item-btn",onClick:()=>addItem(item),children:item},item))})]});};const Cart=_ref2=>{let{cart,moveToBought}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Shopping Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-items",children:cart.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cart-item-btn",onClick:()=>moveToBought(item),children:item},index))})]});};const TotalCost=_ref3=>{let{boughtItems,setCosts,costs}=_ref3;const total=Object.values(costs).reduce((sum,cost)=>sum+(cost||0),0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Total Cost"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:boughtItems.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cost-input",children:[item," -
